report.title: Just Very Sick and Unpleasant
report.author: NotEvenOnce
report.bodytext: I recently obtained some oxy (Roxycodone) and tried it. I took 30 mg both times. I chewed the tablets. The biggest effect was carsickness and nausea. The high wasn't very good. It was intense but not very good and combined with the carsickness feeling I just wanted it to be over. It only got even remotely nice when I lied down in a dark cool room with some music on. The best way to describe the high was clean. It felt very clean, but it wasn't worth it. I would not try this drug only because the bad effects outway the good. Even alcohol is nicer. I felt very much like the most intense effect was motion sickness, in my stomach and in my head that was among the most unpleasant effects in my life. /n /n During the second time I tossed the rest of my pills down the toilet they were so bad. I tried to keep a log of the times but the light made me very sick so I could not do that. This is the worst recreational substance I've ever tried and I won't try it again. I was disappointed because usually I get completely euphoric for hours after a couple tyenol with codines and a couple bowls of pot.
